paragraphs.text:
%md
> If you see 'Interpreter binding' above, just hit `Save` without deselecting any interpreters.

## Welcome to InsightEdge Geospatial API example.

##### This example shows geospatial features of InsightEdge:
* building model with geospatial location field and index
* saving RDDs with geospatial shapes to Data Grid
* loading dataframes with geospatial queries from Data Grid

##### This is a live tutorial, you can run the code yourself. _(click `Run` button in each paragraph from top to bottom)_

result.msg:
If you see 'Interpreter binding' above, just hit Save without deselecting any interpreters.

Welcome to InsightEdge Geospatial API example.

This example shows geospatial features of InsightEdge:
  • building model with geospatial location field and index
  • saving RDDs with geospatial shapes to Data Grid
  • loading dataframes with geospatial queries from Data Grid
This is a live tutorial, you can run the code yourself. (click Run button in each paragraph from top to bottom)

paragraphs.title: School Model
Importing Data To Data Grid
paragraphs.text:
%spark
import model.v1._
import org.insightedge.spark.implicits.all._
import org.openspaces.spatial.ShapeFactory._

val home = scala.sys.env("INSIGHTEDGE_HOME")

val schoolsData = sqlContext.read.json(s"$home/data/montgomery_schools.json")
schoolsData.show()

val schoolsRdd = schoolsData.rdd.map(row => new School(
    id = null,
    row.getAs[String]("name"),
    row.getAs[String]("category"),
    row.getAs[String]("city"),
    row.getAs[String]("address"),
    row.getAs[String]("phone"),
    point(row.getAs[Double]("longitude"), row.getAs[Double]("latitude"))
))

schoolsRdd.saveToGrid()

paragraphs.title: Searching For Schools Near User
paragraphs.text:
%spark
import com.spatial4j.core.distance.DistanceUtils
import org.openspaces.spatial.shapes._

val searchRadius = 3; // km
val userLocation = point(-77.024470, 39.032506)
val searchArea = circle(userLocation, DistanceUtils.KM_TO_DEG * searchRadius)

val schools = sqlContext.read.grid.loadClass[School]
val nearestSchools = schools.filter(schools("location") geoWithin searchArea)
val nearestSchoolsCount = nearestSchools.count()

paragraphs.title: Appending Column With Distance
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

val toDistance = udf { point:Point =>
    val d2r = DistanceUtils.DEGREES_TO_RADIANS
    val r2km = DistanceUtils.RADIANS_TO_DEGREES * DistanceUtils.DEG_TO_KM
    DistanceUtils.distHaversineRAD(point.getY()*d2r, point.getX()*d2r, userLocation.getY()*d2r, userLocation.getX()*d2r) * r2km
}

nearestSchools
    .withColumn("distance", toDistance(nearestSchools("location")))
    .createOrReplaceTempView("nearestSchools")

paragraphs.title: Investigating Data
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select category, distance, name, city, address, phone, location
from nearestSchools
where category = "${category=MIDDLE SCHOOLS,ELEMENTARY SCHOOLS|MIDDLE SCHOOLS|HIGH SCHOOLS}"
order by distance
